info.title: Fair Work Commission Modern Awards Pay Database API
info.description: Open APIs for the Modern Awards Pay Database and its associated Exports

contact.name: Fair Work Commission Portal - Contact Us

get.description: An example GET request to demonstrate the response structure.
Endpoint to retrieve awards with optional filtering and sorting.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The human-readable title of the award.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page requested of the results retrieved.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The limit for the results per page.

parameters.name: award_operative_from
parameters.description: The date when the award came into operation.

parameters.name: award_operative_to
parameters.description: The date when the award ceased to be in effect.
